t: Amazon's Manchester shops won't save the struggling high street | WIRED
s: June 4, 2019 - Not content with beating the British high street, Amazon is joining it. The first of 10 pop-up stores planned by the online shopping giant opened in Manchester on 3 June, providing a home for more than 100 small online businesses.

Amazon's first corporate office outside of London opens in Manchester today and this is what you can expect... - Business Live
s: January 16, 2020 - Amazon’s hugely anticipated Manchester office opens today - its first corporate site outside of London. The ecommerce group has taken over six storeys in the historic Hanover Building, which is now part of the £800m, 20-acre NOMA development.
